price: (48) And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
